name: Citywars Tower Defense
description:
More than 30 unique towers to build. Each with 10 upgrades and their own set of special abilities. For each level completed you gain coins which can be exchanged to the multiple merchants of different cities to unlock better towers.

Here's a few examples:
-Thunder Tower
-Canon Tower
-Cloud Tower
-Slam Tower
-Double Rainbow Tower



At first the resources that you can collect are very limited but every resource that you see in the world can be collected, they only need to have the right tool equipped in your inventory to be gathered. To do so you will have to craft with a multiple crafting table better tools to quickly progress in the game.

Here's a few examples:
-Stone Axe
-Bugs Net
-Iron Shovel
-Fishing Rod
-Stone Pickaxe



More than a dozen equippable weapons and armor which is unique to their specialized class. Each weapon has their own skill tree. Killing monsters will drop experience points that you can use to upgrade your weapon and armor to gain powerful ability.

Here's a few examples:
-Apprentice Wand
-Basic Longbow
-Slingshot
-Stone Knuckles
-Spiked Club
